SELECT a.id,a.create_time,a.member_id,a.member_id as 'member.id',a.action_id,a.action_id as 'action.actionId',a.remark,a.type, a.foreign_id,a.action_ip,b.name as 'member.name',c.name as 'action.name',c.log as 'action.log' FROM tbl_action_log as a left join tbl_member as b on a.member_id=b.id left join tbl_action as c on a.action_id=c.id
and c.id < 10000
and a.member_id=#{memberId}
ORDER BY a.id DESC

SELECT a.id,a.create_time,a.member_id,a.member_id as 'member.id',a.action_id,a.action_id as 'action.actionId',a.type, a.foreign_id,a.action_ip,b.name as 'member.name',b.avatar as 'member.avatar',c.name as 'action.name',c.log as 'action.log', (CASE WHEN a.type=2 THEN (select content from tbl_weibo WHERE id=a.foreign_id) WHEN a.type=1 THEN (SELECT i.title from tbl_article as h LEFT JOIN tbl_archive as i on h.archive_id=i.archive_id WHERE h.id=a.foreign_id) WHEN a.type=4 THEN (SELECT k.title from tbl_group_topic as j LEFT JOIN tbl_archive as k on j.archive_id=k.archive_id WHERE j.id=a.foreign_id) END) as remark FROM tbl_action_log as a left join tbl_member as b on a.member_id=b.id left join tbl_action as c on a.action_id=c.id
and c.id > 10000
and a.member_id=#{memberId}
ORDER BY a.id DESC
